00090 class EGS_TRANSFORMED_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_TransformedSource :
00091     public EGS_BaseSource {
00092 
00093 public:
00094 
00098     EGS_TransformedSource(EGS_BaseSource *Source,
00099                           EGS_AffineTransform *t,
00100                           const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00101         EGS_BaseSource(Name,f), source(Source), T(0) {
00102         setUp(t);
00103     };
00105     EGS_TransformedSource(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00106     void setTransformation(EGS_AffineTransform *t) {
00107         if (T) {
00108             delete T;
00109             T = 0;
00110         }
00111         if (t) {
00112             T = new EGS_AffineTransform(*t);
00113         }
00114     };
00115     const EGS_AffineTransform *getTransform() const {
00116         return T;
00117     };
00118     ~EGS_TransformedSource() {
00119         EGS_Object::deleteObject(source);
00120         if (T) {
00121             delete T;
00122         }
00123     };
00124 
00125     EGS_I64 getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00126                             int &q, int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt,
00127                             EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u) {
00128         EGS_I64 c = source->getNextParticle(rndm,q,latch,E,wt,x,u);
00129         if (T) {
00130             T->rotate(u);
00131             T->transform(x);
00132         }
00133         return c;
00134     };
00135     EGS_Float getEmax() const {
00136         return source->getEmax();
00137     };
00138     EGS_Float getFluence() const {
00139         return source->getFluence();
00140     };
00141     bool storeState(ostream &data) const {
00142         return source->storeState(data);
00143     };
00144     bool setState(istream &data) {
00145         return source->setState(data);
00146     };
00147     bool addState(istream &data_in) {
00148         return source->addState(data_in);
00149     };
00150     void resetCounter() {
00151         source->resetCounter();
00152     };
00153 
00154     bool isValid() const {
00155         return (source != 0);
00156     };
00157 
00158 protected:
00159 
00160     EGS_BaseSource *source; 
00161     EGS_AffineTransform *T; 
00162 
00163     void setUp(EGS_AffineTransform *t);
00164 
00165 };
